description:
Over 2,800 students from 106 countries enrolled in Specialist Series classes by Katy Caselli since September, 2015! Updated in April, 2016!

If you are part of hiring and training in an organization...if you want to make your organization a place that new employees can thrive in...if you are looking for ways to improve your company's or non-profit's bottom line, by positively impacting retention and reducing errors and safety incidents, then this is your class.

Hi, I'm Katy Caselli and I am excited to meet you! I am a learning and development expert and Industrial/Organizational Psychologist, and I work with people just like you to excel with impactful, engaging and effective training programs. They impact the bottom line because they change performance for the better.

In this course I give you a path for creating an orientation that leads students to success. I reveal the secrets of course design that boosts the confidence of your new hires, and introduce your new hires to the unique culture of your organization.

By the end of this course, you will have completed a plan with my experienced guidance to start your own world class New Employee Orientation! So let's get started!
title: Create an Effective & Engaging New Hire Orientation Program
